comment: Hands down one of the best chemistry professors I've ever had. He explains complex topics in a clear and engaging way, and he genuinely cares about his students' success. His lectures are organized, and he always connects the material to real-world examples, which makes it easier to understand and remember.

Professor Rainey is by far the best professor I have ever had during my time at KSU. He is unbelievably good at what he does, and attending office hours will guarantee that you get an A in this class. I am so grateful I took him!!
Attendance not mandatory but does give bonus quizzes. Records lectures and responds to emails.

I had him as a first time professor, I have to say he was so accommodating. He was very willing to reopen assignments and work with you when you needed help. He had summary assignments that was a lot of work in the class. But I would recommend taking him as he does want you to succeed and he actually cares about you!
